title: looking to trade for eddie plank
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: looking to trade for eddie plank
posts.post_content:
hello all!!

looking to trade some blank backs and possibly printers scraps/ rare backs for an example of eddie......
I have some very unique, one of a kind cards....;)
id love the one that sold in memory with the creases.....

lets talk

pm or email me

:)
If and When you get your Eddie Plank please share some pics.  I have a lifelong obsession with the card.

I know how you feel!:)

mine is with mr. wagner......long story......I have been collecting as a kid.....missed a few opps to get one.....I have been obsessed with getting one...

mr plank may have to do in the meanwhile:).....I have some very desirable pieces to trade.....if not, we might have to see at the national;)
